messages.message:
Listing a couple of issues I observed trying to mount my repos in dogfood:
1. Create a new subspace throws this error but on refreshing explorer subspace shows up fine.`Mkdir - RPC Error .. details in screenshot` 
2.  Trying to go to Instabase Drive - later on however throws an error - `FError loading contents, folder does not exist.` 
3. Do we need to get access to repos like Ib Engineering and IB Solutions again in dogfood env? My account does not show those Org spaces in Dogfood, only shows up in Prod.
4. Trying to mount existing repos  failing (following steps in doc (https://docs.google.com/document/d/11ExENh4Y-xvrg4zr23zN05GnvK-vZVy3_AvGcwJHiYg/edit#)) with attached error. I was able to mount 2 of my repos yesterday but unable to mount rest of them.

Hey! For 1 & 2, I think it is because we are not handling root directories properly in file-service v2. Iâ€™m pushing out a fix soon. As a workaround, you should be able to create the subspace in the uat environment and then use it from dogfood for now.

I think @Jessica and @Heymian have context on 4.
Thanks Nidhi. able to get those working in UAT
